amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Afghanistan Infrastructure Fund by $200 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 41 printed in the Congressional Record to strike $200,000,000 from the Afghanistan Infrastructure Fund and apply the same amount to the Spending Reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 217 (Roll no. 507).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 217 (Roll no. 507).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. Cohen.
